                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Game		|
Platform.............: Windows   	|
Crack................: Included		|
NetCrack.............: Included         |
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Human Head Studios licensed Epic Games' Unreal Tournament engine to create Rune
and made several enhancements to it, including a skeletal animation system, a 
new particle effects system, and an enhanced shadowing system. Although made 
using the Unreal Engine, Rune is a third-person perspective game without any 
shooting. The weapons used in the game include swords, axes, maces, and other 
medieval/fantasy melee weapons. Despite using an engine made for shooting, 
the interface lends itself well to a playing style consisting of running, jumping, 
and hacking at opponents.

An innovative feature of the game is that anything dropped by a dead opponent 
can be picked up and used. This extends to include body parts. Limbs can be swung 
as clubs, and grotesquely enough, heads can be carried and used as weapons. 
Although the game includes no ranged weapons, any weapon can be thrown. The 
handaxe is a commonly thrown weapon because of the range and speed with which it 
travels through the air.

Currently this release allows up to four player to go through the 
entire main PC campaign on various difficulty settings through an internet 
or LAN configuration, without needing to purchase Rune or Rune: Halls of Vahallah. 
Like all Federation releases this one has been upgraded to be both portable and 
thinner, while utilizing less active memory. Several scripts have additionally 
been added to prevent crashes and a critical network bug (Winsock Incrimination)
related to Vista incompatibility. It is also noteworthy that this release has had 
all its loading screens removed as they are deemed unnecessary.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              Miscellaneous Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please Note The Following:

.I.
The Federation takes no responsibility for any damage that may come to your 
computer through the trial of this game. This mod has been tested to work 
on Windows XP and Vista. No support or technical assistance will be provided. 
Ever. Creation of this release took a lifetime of unpaid labour. 
.II.
The mod utilized in this release was made by the Rune Co-op Mod Team who neither 
support nor condone software piracy. The Federation has released their work 
without their permission.
.III.
The Rune Server Launcher utilized in this release was created by "Critter"
from Dot Cafe's House of Pain who neither supports nor condones software piracy.
The Federation has released his/her work without his/her permission.
.IV.
This game can work on single player featuring the main campaigns or through 
the co-op mod and unlike most release appears legitimate online when joining or 
hosting a server. 
.V.
To all the Fans, Friends, Foes, Members and Affiliates, of the FEDERATION:

			-----------------------
			|THANKS FOR EVERYTHING| 
                        -----------------------

Because of you we are "STILL UNDERGROUND" and "STILL ALIVE".
[54686f73652057686f204b6e6f772055732043616e2046696e64205573]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steps:

(1.) Extract the contents of the "Rune - Co-op.rar" file to a directory of your 
choice and then Navigate to the extracted directory (by default the "Rune -  
Co-op"  directory). 

Note: This release is portable and therefore the binaries/executables within 
make no changes to the game/system files which are already updated, modded, 
and cracked.

Note: If prompted by the "RUNE CO-OP - SERVER" binary/executable to 
select the "Rune.ini" file associated with this release it can be found in
the ".RUNESYSTEM" directory.

(3.) Double-click on the "RUNE CO-OP - CLIENT" binary/executable whose name 
corresponds with the desired game. Press the "ESC" key to access the main menu. 

Shortcut Information:

"RUNE CO-OP - CLIENT"         - Rune Multiplayer/Singleplayer Co-op Gameplay
"RUNE CO-OP - SERVER"         - Rune Server Launching Application

Notes:

Extra content, including game covers and manuals, are located in the ".Extras" 
directory.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                  In The Pipeline
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
T-BOX - ZKZ of the Federation Team

Games - Pending
EMUs  - Complete
NFO   - Pending
Test  - Complete

This release is imminent. This project seeks to combine a Lite (less than 700m)
Vista build, bootscreen, frontend, registry tweaks, several related 
applications, twenty-plus emulators and tens of thousands of various game 
images and ROMS in an orderly package. This package would then allow a user 
to easily create a SF personal computer (or any other light PC) that would 
act as any console from the first to sixth generation. This has been a huge
undertaking but if it is successful this project will provide the PC scene with 
the first real replacement for consoles. Please understand that projects like 
this one can have unsuspected kinks. Please be patient.

Test  - Complete - Loads of Fun

This update will include the Black Hawk Down Assault Co-op mini mod made 
for FarCry. It will be released when time can be found for basic testing and 
the writing of a beginer-friendly NFO.

Quake 4 Ultimate Co-op - Opencoop

Game  - Pending
Crack - Pending
NFO   - Pending
Mod   - Pending
Test  - Pending

As many of you know opencoop recently released a tech demo of their next project 
Quake 4 Co-op which allows you to traverse most of the levels, with large amounts 
of lag, glitches, and crashes. Once they have a clean version working, this 
mod will be released. Because we are waiting for them to finish their work there 
is no release date.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
			    Scene Requests/Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This release was one of the most challenging video games we have ever sought to 
port to Vista, requiring large changes to vital engine packages and the learning 
of UnrealScript, a new programming language  (a cross between Java, C++, and the 
original developer's desires), but we did it. This release is one of the last of 
the "Third Wave", serving as a testament, not to our egos but to the validity of 
our creed:

                            [Scientia] [est] [Licentia]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                  Known Problems
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(1.) False Positive - The users anti-virus client may detect this program as a 
Virus or Trojan. This false positive is caused by the binary wrapped scripts 
which are utilized as launchers for the game. As these files create hidden 
functionality they appear as threatening to the overzealous virus scanner eSafe.
Detailed scans have/will indicate that this release neither accesses key system 
files or the internet. There is no way for these files to harm your computer.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                  Federal Rule
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you like this game, BUY IT.
